Wrapround cover: Robin Smith (character montage)
The Dracula File (part 9) (Simon Furman - Eric Bradbury)Library of Death - Ghost Town (Fred Baker - Mike Dorey)The Thirteenth Floor (part 9) (John Wagner/Alan Grant - Jose Ortiz)Tales from the Grave - A Fatal Extraction (part 1) (R.Hunter - Jim Watson)A Ghastly Tale - The Summoning (writer and artist: unknown)Monster (part 9) (John Wagner - Jesus Redondo)Fiends and Neighbours (reprint from Cor! comic)The Nightcomers (part 3) (Tom Tully - John Richardson)
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2025-01-02 07:50:31. [CVDB219538]
